[Home](./index.md) &gt; [mui-country-code-selector](./mui-country-code-selector.md) &gt; [CountryType](./mui-country-code-selector.countrytype.md)

## CountryType interface

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Represents data for an individual country. Contains records for the name, the international calling code, and two letter ISO 3166 country code of the country.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface CountryType 
```
